messages.subject: Columbus, OH unschoolers?
messages.msgSnippet: Is there anybody on this list that lives in or near Columbus or anywhere in OH, for that matter? My husband s job is transferring us from Michigan (very easy
messages.messageBody:
Is there anybody on this list that lives in or near Columbus or
anywhere in OH, for that matter? My husband's job is transferring us
from Michigan (very easy state for unschooling) to Ohio in a matter of
a few weeks and I wanted to get in touch with people in OH and find
out how the laws really work. I've read the HSLDA site and I think
they make it more frightening than it actually is. I'm concerned about
reporting and things like that.
I don't want to clog this list, so please reply to me privately at
abbyaldrich1@.... Thanks!
Abby
